Klasse ShaderStage

java.lang.Object
Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.ShaderStage
public class ShaderStage extends Object
A shader specifies programmable operations that execute for each vertex, control point, tessellated vertex, primitive, fragment, or workgroup in the corresponding stage(s) of the graphics and compute pipelines.
Siehe auch:
  • Shaders :: Vulkan Documentation Project

  • Methodendetails

    • of

      public static ShaderStage of(ShaderModule module, String entrypoint, int bits)
      Creates a new ShaderStage.
      Parameter:
      module - the module containing the actual shader code
      entrypoint - the entry point name, conventionally 'main'
      bits - the bits, eg VK10.VK_SHADER_STAGE_FRAGMENT_BIT
      Gibt zurück:
      the created ShaderStage
